title: TMGW #172: Grace and Mamrie Bet at the Races
description:
This week Grace and Mamrie discuss their Vegas Trip, Katy Perry’s residency, flying Spirit, and salad dressing jewelry.

Go to http://hellofresh.com/tmgw16 and use code tmgw16 for up to 16 free meals and 3 free gifts!

Go to http://bombas.com/tmgw and get 20% off your first purchase.

Go to http://audible.com/tmgw or text tmgw to 500-500 to get started with Audible.

Get 25% off and zero delivery fees on your first order of $15 or more, when you download the DoorDash app and enter code TMGW.

Tour Tix: www.thismightgetweird.com
